I’m also curious about the process of making them so I can understand what steps go into making an edible.

title: Can you eat a frozen hotdog?
self_text: I was wondering if you could eat a frozen hot dog without getting sick, and I don't want to waste a $3 hot dog.

title: Do you think that people are actually afraid of the unknown?
self_text: I have always wondered about what makes people so scared of things they don’t know, like ghosts or monsters. But it is possible that there is nothing out there at all, and we just imagine things because our minds aren't used to the quiet.  If that’s true, how can humans still be terrified by something they cannot see or hear?   I wonder if it has to do with the fact that humans are prey animals.  We evolved to fear predators, and now we apply those instincts to everything unfamiliar. It seems logical.  What do you guys think?

title: Is the US a country that is dying?
self_text: I've been watching American news and I see so much violence, poverty, racism, corruption, misinformation, etc.. It makes me wonder what’s happening to America? Do you guys think it's going down hill or are we just at our lowest point? What do people do about it?  (I have no political stance or anything)

title: Are there any good, affordable headphones that don't sound like crap?
self_text: I want to buy a new pair of headphones but I can’t stand the quality of audio in my current ones. They sound muffled and distorted. I have a $100 budget so something decent isn’t out of the question.

title: Is the moon made of cheese?
self_text: I was watching a documentary about space and it mentioned that scientists are still not entirely sure what the moon is made of. They’re going to send robots to take samples and test them.  I know it's probably something boring like rocks, but I keep thinking… could it be made of cheese? Like, maybe it formed from giant meteorites hitting earth over billions of years, with all the melted cheese sticking together?  It sounds ridiculous, but the more I think about it, the more plausible it seems.  Anyone else ever considered this?

title: Does anyone know how to make a good quality, cheap, edible gummy bear?
self_text: I have been trying to make some for myself and my friends but it always comes out gummy like a rock or just too sticky. It's so frustrating when you try to do something simple and it doesn't work!  I want to experiment with adding different flavors and colors as well. Any tips on what kind of ingredients to use that would be affordable and produce the best results? Thank you in advance!

title: Is there a way to get rid of the smell that comes from my feet?
self_text: I'm on the verge of a full blown panic attack because my feet have been smelling like an old gym sock for weeks and I can’t figure out how to get rid of it. I've tried everything - showers, foot spray, socks, shoes, washing them, etc. but nothing seems to work. Any advice?

title: How do I make a good first impression?
self_text: I’m starting college in a few weeks and I’m super nervous about meeting people.  I want to be someone that people like to hang out with, but I don’t even know where to start. I am an introvert so it is hard for me to just randomly strike up conversations with people. Any advice?

title: Why do people who are rich buy a mansion but live in an apartment?
self_text: I'm seeing more and more wealthy people living in apartments, not houses or mansions.  Is there something going on that I’m missing? Are they just trying to be more casual/low-key? Or is it for some other reason?

title: How many Rick Roll's are out there?
self_text: I know that the internet is a weird place, but I've heard so many people say that they have been Rick Rolled and I can't believe how many there must be out there. Are you guys able to find any new Rick Rolls or do people just give up?   Also is there a way to track Rick Rolls?  It would be cool to see an interactive map of all the Rick Rolls out there.  This might be a terrible question but let me know.

title: Are the Simpsons still on air?
self_text: I've been watching them since i was a little kid and my parents would watch it while they did dishes, but now I can’t find any episodes or anything on TV. Is there some kind of streaming service that has them? Or are they just over?

title: Are there any good podcasts for learning about the history of music?
self_text: I’m really interested in how different genres evolved and some of the important figures involved.   I’ve heard a little bit, but nothing that seems to go into detail too much.  Are there any you would recommend?

title: Are there any good ways to get a new dog?
self_text: I'm considering getting a dog but it would be nice if I could adopt a puppy from a shelter or rescue organization.
